text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Supported you… I didn't do anything so grand though.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's not true! You taught me how to run properly, you've helped me out in regards to school-related things, and and-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Just relax, Spe-chan. Just by taking a deep breath it should calm your nerves, why don't you try it?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: O-okay! Su～…Puhaa～!
The day of the [Yayoi Sho] ― It was the first time the top three from the "Golden Generation" would meet in competition so it drew a lot of attention.
Seiun Sky and King Halo are strong, they've achieved great results. Those are the opponents you're facing today. Of course, it won't be an easy race.
Seiun Sky and King Halo are strong, they've achieved great results. Those are the opponents you're facing today. Of course, it won't be an easy race.
However, before your opponents, you should worry about yourself! All that effort up until now, go out there and show them everything you've got!
However, before your opponents, you should worry about yourself! All that effort up until now, go out there and show them everything you've got!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We'll be cheering you on with all we've got.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The sight of you crossing the goal before everyone else, let's show that to both of your Mothers.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll be heading out!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Allllright, all the things I did in training, I'll show them the results of all of it!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Looks like you're in top condition～, Spe-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, Sei-chan and King-chan.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: See, I was so nervous I could hardly sleep～. In today's race, I might end up racing from behind, maybe?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh, really…?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Good grief… isn't that obviously a lie? That sense of tension in the air is going to be ruined.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Understand? This is the real deal, it's not practice anymore. This is a serious competition…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You may be classmates, but on the turf we're rivals. For the sake of proving that I'm first class, I will continue to win!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Her determination is on another level today～.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well well, how will this turn out? Alright then Spe-chan, see ya out there～.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Me too, together with Trainer-san and everyone on the team, I did my best, I don't want to lose…!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Seiun Sky is in the lead! Seiun Sky is taking the front! She's struggling to pull away from King Halo who is desperately chasing in a battle for 3rd!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And from the outside comes Special Week! Special Week is coming up behind with incredible speed!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: 2 lengths, 1, now she's even, and she's passed! Special Week takes the lead and crosses the goal!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: 2nd place is Seiun Sky, 3rd place is King Halo! As expected, these 3 contenders gave us a show at [Yayoi Sho]!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaa… Haaa… Haaa… I-I won…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: … But…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: … King-chan, Sei-chan…
In the battle between the "Golden Generation's" top 3, Special Week claimed a grand victory.
Several days had passed since then, and now, finally, training for the classic race, the [Satsuki Sho] had begun. One day-

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fuu… Good work out there, Special Week-san. You're gradually starting to get better at grasping the flow of a race.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa… Fuu～… I'm finally getting better at running while keeping everything in mind!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: All of that's because of Suzuka-san and McQueen-san being my training parters!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: However, in a real race you won't be running with us so, make sure not to forget your experiences with your actual opponents.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Sei-chan likes the front, King-chan stays with the middle group… Front… Middle… Front… Middle…
With that said, it seems like after running in the [Yayoi Sho], now you're more conscious of your opponents.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's because after running together with those two, I feel like I'm finally starting to understand.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sei-chan and King-chan get along really well, and they're always hanging out together but…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Both of them were completely different from normal… I'd never seem them like that before…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: In front of the goal, their tenacity, and persistence…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I may have won the [Yayoi Sho], but if I had let my guard down even a little, I think the results would have been completely different!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's why, I have to keep working harder and harder too!
The one that chose to have the other team members be her training partners was Special Week herself.
Rather than letting the victory go to her head, she seemed to be preparing herself. Perhaps this was proof that she truly was part of the "Golden Generation".
Alright, let's revise the training menu then. Once again, Spe's last stretch surprised me so, I want to continue to improve that strong point.
choice_data_list: Spe, we'll definitely win the [Satsuki Sho] too!
Spe, we'll definitely win the [Satsuki Sho] too!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: This dream entrusted to me by my Moms, I'll fulfill it for sure!
